title: Red Line
description: Be careful who you trust.When their parents died Katrin put her life on hold to take care of her baby sister Lisa. All that changes when she meets Ulf on the subway. She decides to take a chance on life and invites him to her sister's birthday party.As soon as Ulf sees Katrin he can't think of anything else. The world around him disappears and all that exists is the thought of having her scent, her taste, her flesh inside of him.Who would you invite to your home?
author: Tanja Gustavsson
